But it's not even like the audio is cutting out or out of sync, there is NOTHING! I've never had this problem before when converting with Handbrake...
Audio works with VLC player but nothing else on MY computer... not sure which codec i am missing because this does work with VLC player..

This movie drags from the start. The actor cast for the main role is boring. The movie is directed by an Indian guy who put a goofy Indian "gansta"-type character into the plot in a way he hoped would normalize Indians in America, and portray Indians as "cool" and even dominant over Caucasians. 

If you don't believe me, pay special attention to the very racist references to Chinese people. I was in India last year for a month, and Indians say nasty things about the Chinese - like they "Eat their own babies."

I liked Beerfest & Super Troopers was more entertaining than I expected.  This was less.

My thoughts on Olivia Munn:

Loved her on G4TV (Attack Of The Show & XPlay), UNTIL I heard that for all her talk she doesn't actually play games much if at all!  THAT'S fake - working for a video-game network and claiming to be a gamer when you're not...  She even reviewed games without actually having played them herself.

As an actress she's tolerable.  Better than just a pretty face, but certainly no Oscar-worthy performances yet (not surprising given the material).

As a model she's HOT.  And she was willing to go the extra mile to ham it up alongside Kevin Pereira on AOTS, something only Sarah Underwood seemed willing to do lately.

(From what I've seen, now that Kevin is gone AOTS is seeing much lower ratings, and the procession of unfunny awkward guest hosts is getting worse and worse.  Kevin was a sleazebag and not half as funny as he thought he was, but seeing these other guys trip over themselves trying to deliver the same cheap humor is wearing thin.)
The sound clips every second for me. Like someone is playing with a mute button? Anyone else have this problem?
Thank you guys keep up the great work:)
